title: Team chat in loading screen. :)
body:
Might as well have something interactive while we wait for the potatoes to load.

amiright/10

replies.body: I don't see any reason why that would be a bad or a hard thing to implement. Something to do while that one person is feeding the coal into their Pc. And for strategising too.
Totally agree! Gives a chance for strategising against the other team comp.
you can open client whilst in game and loading screen, so it shouldn't be hard. jut make it put you in a chatroom with your teammates

Except a lot of people solo queue, and have no easy way of talking to their current team mates through the client. Also, LoL is designed to run on potatoes. Potatoes can't alt + tab properly, (or even at all in severe potato cases) whilst in loading screen - I know this for a fact. One of the main reasons to do this is not just to chat and strategise, but also occupy ourselves so we're not waiting around doing nothing.
